remarks: The covers relation implies no in-betweenness.  ( ~ cvnbtwn2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lcvnbtwn.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lcvnbtwn.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.

lcvnbtwn.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. S ) $.
lcvnbtwn.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
lcvnbtwn.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.

lcvnbtwn2.q $e |- ( ph -> U C_ T ) $.
lcvnbtwn2 $p |- ( ph -> U = T ) $.
